short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change your display name in Stream Payments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disclaimer

If the Stream Payments engineers decide to make major changes to the site (not likely), it could silently break this extension, in which case the default username you signed up with could possibly get sent instead of your custom nickname until an update to the extension can be made.

Usage

After you install the extension, navigate to the Stream Payments "send" page for the user you wish to send a payment to. You should now see a username listed next to the page title along with an Edit button.

This is the name that will show when you send a payment. Click the Edit button to enter a new nickname. Entering an empty value will reset it to the default.
